meanings.definition: Not having been experienced or realized.
meanings.sent1: The unlived dreams of the young girl filled her with hope.
meanings.sent2: The unlived adventures awaited the brave explorer.
meanings.sent3: The unlived opportunities knocked on the door of the hesitant student.
meanings.sent4: The unlived possibilities danced in the air, just out of reach.
meanings.sent5: The unlived moments whispered secrets of what could have been.

meanings.definition: Not having been inhabited or occupied.
meanings.sent1: The unlived house stood empty on the quiet street.
meanings.sent2: The unlived land was untouched by human hands.
meanings.sent3: The unlived room echoed with the ghosts of what could have been.
meanings.sent4: The unlived cityscape stretched out before the traveler, full of potential.
meanings.sent5: The unlived building held stories of the past, waiting to be told.
